ygData.subject: Diablo enters the Battle
ygData.msgSnippet: Diablo saw the mud coming towards him, and almost casually leaned to one side, and the mud went on its original path and hit the tree behind him. He narrowed

Subject: Diablo enters the Battle
Message-ID: <91e8vj+chrg@...>
In-Reply-To: <976921955.34923@egroups.com>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 1206
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: steph_teltoli@...

Diablo saw the mud coming towards him, and almost casually leaned to 
one side, and the mud went on its original path and hit the tree 
behind him. He narrowed his eyes in contempt, and would have smirked 
if he had a mouth. Mud as a weapon? Against him? He assumed the Mud 
was an attempt to uncover his cloaking. But the cloaking/stealth 
technology worked as a not-so-solid sheild around him, so even if the 
mud did hit, it wouldn't have been seen.

He then sighed as he watched the battle carry on with his main eyes. 
One stalk eye was focused on Angel Prime, and the other on Vamprah 
who had left for no apparant reason. His right stalk eyes swiveled 
over to rest on the extremely fat GodFather, and he would have 
laughed out loud. Would have. But.. he hadn't quite figured out how 
to talk, if he didn't have a mouth...

Diablo grimaced with his eyes, and stepped almost daintily from his 
cover, still sheilded. His two meter long tail, held in an arc, 
swayed above his head. Up and close would be good to observe the 
battle. Standing about 5 meters from the very back of the attackers, 
he cocked his head to aim and flung out another cloaked scythe, 
poisoned on the tip, towards WindLord.
